Silver.description: The Silver tier provides a fundamental gym experience tailored for individuals who are looking to begin or maintain their fitness journey. A perfect choice for those seeking both affordability and quality.
details: Unlimited access to our state-of-the-art gym facilities during regular hours, offering a range of cardio and strength training equipment.
Join group fitness classes ranging from HIIT to Yoga, ensuring there's always something new to try and a community waiting to support you.
Access to basic locker facilities, ensuring your belongings remain safe while you exercise.

Gold.description: The Gold tier introduces an enhanced fitness experience. It's designed for those who appreciate a little more luxury and assistance in their routine. It's our most popular choice, balancing cost with an expanded range of perks.
details: Everything the Silver Membership offers and more.
Priority booking for group fitness classes, ensuring you never miss out on your favorite sessions.
2 hours of personal training sessions every week. Collaborate with experienced trainers who will provide a fitness regimen that addresses your unique needs.
Your personal locker, giving you a dedicated space for your gym essentials, so you're always prepared.

Platinum.description: The Platinum tier represents the pinnacle of our offerings, merging exclusivity with unmatched amenities. It's meticulously designed for those who demand the very best in their fitness journey.
details: Everything the Gold Membership offers, plus additional elite benefits.
24/7 gym access. Whether you're an early bird or a night owl, our gym is always open for you. Train on your own schedule, free from the constraints of regular operational hours.
4 hours of personal training sessions every week. These extended hours ensure you're always progressing, always challenging yourself, and always under the guidance of our top trainers.
Exclusive access to our luxurious locker rooms, reminiscent of a spa retreat. Enjoy premium amenities including steam rooms, saunas, and plush lounging areas.
Never worry about parking with your reserved priority parking space. Plus, benefit from a dedicated member service hotline, ensuring instant assistance whenever required.
